page.title: 08Industry
page.content: The only major industry in the aea is Tunnel Cement of Padeswood.It is situated about 8 miles west of Chester and 1 mile south east of Buckley.It was the first cement manufacturing works to be built in the U.K. after world war 2.The basic raw materials for the production of cement at Padeswood are limestone which comes from Cefn Mawr to the west of Mold. The shale comes from the waste tips of Llay main colliery, 7 miles south of Padeswood.they also get water from Kinnerton.Sand is available locally and gypsum is found under the Cheshire Plain to the east.Presently the company employs about 600 people.Some of the raw materials arrive by rail,others by road and much of the cement leaves this way.Tipper trucks are used for this.
